full_summary:
**Tender Reference Information**
=====================================

* **Tender Title (English)**: W7701-237689 TBIPS Professional Service
* **Tender Title (French)**: W7701-237689 Service Professionnel SPICT
* **Reference Number**: WS4113406083-4113635963
* **Amendment Number**: 3rd Amendment
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4113406083
* **Publication Date**: 2024-04-30
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-30T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-05-10
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified
* **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
* **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré

**Request for Proposal**
-------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of professional services to support the configuration of security appliances and software tools for Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), Valcartier Research Center.

**Technical Requirements**
---------------------------

The proposed services must be designed to selectively allow or block specific data types depending on their origin, security level, and direction taken. 

**Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------------

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on a comparative evaluation of the submitted proposals considering both technical merit and price.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Alexandra Parent, PSPC
* **Email**: alexandra.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19563218?extsite=MTk1NjMyMTHfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The RFP must be submitted no later than 14:00 HAE on May 30th, 2024. Late submissions will be considered non-responsive. 

The technical documentation and other supporting materials required for this submission are available on the specified URL above. 

This bid is subject to the free trade agreements listed
